    • Method Detail

      • beginValidation

        public void beginValidation(ComponentType compType,
                            String compName)
        start validating a component. This is not recursive. validation is a sequential process. Validation for one component must be completed (by calling endValidation()) before starting the next one.
        Parameters:
        compType -
        compName -

      • endValidation

        public void endValidation()
        mark end of validation for the current component.

      • checkRecordExistence

        public int checkRecordExistence(String recName,
                                String fieldName,
                                boolean isRequired)
        Many components refer to record. Here is a short-cut for them. Add this record as reference, and add error in case it i not defined
        Parameters:
        recName -
        fieldName -
        isRequired -
        Returns:
        0 if all ok, 1 if an error got added

      • checkDtExistence

        public int checkDtExistence(String dataTypeName,
                            String fieldName,
                            boolean isRequired)
        Many components refer to data type. Here is a short-cut for them. Add this data type as reference, and add error in case it i not defined
        Parameters:
        dataTypeName -
        fieldName -
        isRequired -
        Returns:
        0 if all ok, 1 if an error got added

      • checkClassName

        public int checkClassName(String className,
                          Class<?> klass)
        check existence of a class and whether it implements the right interface
        Parameters:
        className -
        klass -
        Returns:
        0 if all OK, 1 if an error got added
